title: Entertainment Live: 13 October 2015 - BBC News
summary: naomie harris defends daniel craig over bond comments .
tv director danny cohen to leave the bbc .
john whittingdale backs bbc music stations .
booker prize winner to be announced later .

documents.title: jlaw hits out at hollywood pay inequality
text: hollywood star jennifer lawrence has spoken out on lena dunham 's blog lenny about the fight for gender equality in hollywood .
she explained that when the sony hack happened at the end of last year , she blamed herself when she found out she was paid less than her male counterparts , not the corporation .
it 's hard for me to speak about my experience as a working woman because i can safely say my problems are n't exactly relatable .
when the sony hack happened and i found out how much less i was being paid ( than my male counterparts ) , i got mad at myself .
i failed as a negotiator because i gave up early .
i did n't want to keep fighting over millions of dollars that , frankly , due to two franchises , i do n't need .
( i told you it was n't relatable , do n't hate me ) .
if i 'm honest with myself , i would be lying if i did n't say there was an element of wanting to be liked that influenced my decision to close the deal without a real fight .
i did n't want to seem difficult '' or spoiled . ''
the hunger games star questioned if women were socially conditioned to behave this way .
could there still be a lingering habit of trying to express our opinions in a certain way that does n't offend '' or scare '' men ?
but the oscar-winning star has decided to change tack .
i 'm over trying to find the adorable '' way to state my opinion and still be likable !
i do n't think i 've ever worked for a man in charge who spent time contemplating what angle he should use to have his voice heard .
it 's just heard .
so hollywood , what have you got to say for yourself ?

documents.title: vance joins supergirl cast
text: british actor chris vance looks set to play the dc comics villain non , in cbs ' supergirl series in the us .
the show stars melissa benoist as supergirl and he will play her `` greatest threat '' .
non is a former scientist and a `` brutal kryptonian military officer who is sinister , powerful and angry '' .
ooer .
author: The Hollywood Reporter

documents.title: please cast me in star wars , pleads slater
text: actor christian slater is desperate to be in star wars because it is the only thing that will make his children sit up and take notice .
`` i 'm interested in doing things that scare the heck out of me , and that would be a fear i would be willing to walk through , '' he said .
`` it would make my son happy , and frankly i need all the leverage i can get to make me seem cool at home .
please , help me out , talk to some people and make it happen . ''
the heathers and name of the rose star is currently in the new amazon prime drama mr robot , about elliot , a cyber-security engineer by day and vigilante hacker by night .
author: Radio Times

documents.title: bowman turned down radio x
text: dj and presenter edith bowman has said she was approached for the line-up for radio x , the station which promised to be the `` first truly male-focused '' station .
the station , which launched in september , has chris moyles leading the way with its breakfast show and its other presenters include vernon kay , johnny vaughan and kaiser chiefs ' ricky wilson .

bowman , who said she could not commit to the show , added she did not think the station was sexist , and added : `` i did n't really know where i wanted to go radio wise it was n't the right time really . ''
author: NME

documents.title: thrones star hails 'wonderful ' capaldi
text: game of thrones star maisie williams has praised peter capaldi , saying it was a `` joy '' to work with the `` wonderful , wonderful '' doctor who actor .
williams , 18 , who plays the feisty arya stark in hbo 's hugely successful fantasy series is to appear in two episodes of doctor who .
she said capaldi `` totally lived up to my expectations '' .
`` people say 'do n't meet your idols as they never turn out to be who you want them to be ' .
`` that was completely not the case with peter and he 's been wonderful and really helpful on set . ''
williams will appear in the girl who died on 17 october and the woman who lived the following week .

documents.title: taylor swift leads american music award nominations
text: pop star taylor swift has up six nominations for this year 's american music awards - including a bid for the covered artist of the year prize .

her hit single blank space - which she performed at last year 's ceremony - is also up for song of the year , alongside mark ronson and bruno mars 's uptown funk ; ed sheeran 's thinking our loud ; the weeknd 's ca n't feel my face and wiz khalifa 's see you again .
ed sheeran and the weeknd are the second most-nominated stars on the list , with five nominations apiece .
both are up for artist of the year , competing against swift and a whole host of others - luke bryan , ariana grande , maroon 5 , nicki minaj , one direction , sam smith and meghan trainor .
jennifer lopez hosts the ceremony on 22 november .
you can see the full list of nomineeson the ama website .

pearce , who also starred in the adventures of priscilla , queen of the desert and of course neighbours , split from her in january .

documents.title: bobby brown writes 'therapeutic ' memoir
text: singer bobby brown , the ex-husband of the late whitney houston and their late daughter bobbi kristina , is to write a memoir .
it is , perhaps unsurprisingly , to be called my prerogative , after his hit song .
`` right after i signed on to write my story , i went through one of the most agonising traumas i had ever experienced with the death of my daughter , '' he said .
bobbi kristina , 22 , was found face-down in a bath in january and she died at a hos six months later .
houston drowned in a bath at a los angeles hotel in 2012 on the eve of the grammy awards ceremony .

`` i was surprised by how therapeutic it was to work on this project , to look at the entire arc of my life and to realise that although there has been considerable pain , i have also been incredibly blessed , '' he added .
brown , 46 , who co-founded the group new edition more than 30 years ago , is writing the memoir with nick chiles , who also worked on a book with the rev al sharpton .

documents.title: why dame maggie prefers alan bennett 's driveway
text: maggie smith says she felt `` easier '' playing a homeless woman in her latest film than she did playing the upper class violet crawley in tv drama downton abbey .

in the lady in the van , a true story adapted by alan bennett from his west end play , dame maggie plays the eccentric ( and pungent ) miss shepherd , who lived in an old vehicle on bennett 's driveway in north london for 15 years .
`` curiously , i feel easier with the lady in the van than the lady with the hat on , '' said dame maggie , speaking after a screening of the film at the london film festival .
it was much easier to be miss shepherd because she did n't mind how she looked .
lady violet was forever in those corsets .
for comfort alone it was nicer to be miss shepherd . ''
the film , directed by former national theatre boss nicholas hytner , stars alex jennings as bennett..
it was shot at the writer 's former home in camden where the real miss shepherd had lived in her van from 1974 until her death in 1989 .

it was entertaining to see the look on the residents ' faces , many of whom were there when all this happened , when the van drove down the crescent , '' sir nicholas said , recalling filming on location in 2014 .
`` they had mixed feelings about that. ``
the film is out in the uk on 13 november .
author: Tim Masters
Arts and Entertainment correspondent

documents.title: guy garvey to curate meltdown
text: elbow 's lead singer and bbc 6 music presenter guy garvey is to curate the meltdown festival .
the southbank centre 's festival was launched 23 years ago , and has previously been put together by illustrious stars including david bowie , yoko ono , david byrne , ray davies and morrissey .
garvey is no stranger to success either , having bagged the mercury music prize , a brit award and two ivor novellos .
he said : `` i want my meltdown to be a party where everyone feels invited and everyone leaves having had the best night out . ''
sounds like a good plan .

documents.title: phil collins - read all about it
text: phil collins is set to tell all in his autobiography , saying : `` i am ready to go on record about my life in music with all the highs and all the lows , and to tell the story from my point of view - warts and all . ''
collins , 64 , who started his career as the drummer and then lead singer of genesis went on to have massive solo success with his 80s songs in the air tonight and against all odds .
`` several times over the last few years i have been asked to write a biography but never felt that the time was right - until now , '' he said .
collins ranks alongside michael jackson and paul mccartney as one of just three recording artists in history to sell more than 100 million albums both as a solo artist and as a member of a band .
he also notched up seven grammys , six brits , and an oscar for best original song for you 'll be in my heart from the disney film tarzan .
and of course , he was the inspiration for the famous drumming gorilla in that chocolate advert .
the book will be published , possibly minus the gorilla , in october 2016 .

documents.title: bugged out
text: jake bugg is self-producing his third album , after his record label said the demo recordings were better than the finished studio versions .
`` weirdly enough , the label preferred my recordings to [ the producer ] i 'd been recording with , '' he told the bbc .
`` it was n't my choice , it was their choice - so they [ the demos ] must be ok .
i 've been mixing them and making them sound real sharp and real nice . ''
the singer had previously been in the studio with beastie boys star mike d .
however , he did not confirm whether it was those sessions the label rejected .
author: Mark Savage
Music reporter

documents.title: dame shirley for christmas number one ?
text: dame shirley bassey has recorded her first ever christmas song and she 's teamed up with singing trio blake for the occasion .
they have recorded the christmas song ( chestnuts roasting on an open fire ) .
`` i would love to have a christmas number one , '' she revealed at the recording of the single 's video in a north london studio .
dame shirley first met up with blake when they sang moon river at the star 's 70th birthday party .
blake 's ollie said they drew up a shortlist of five tracks .
`` we felt sure that dame shirley could make a hit out of any of the songs on our list , so we sent it over and let her choose the one that she liked best - which was the christmas song . ''
after recording the song dame shirley said : `` i was quite overwhelmed because it just fits my voice so well .
i was amazed how well our voices blended . ''
dame shirley 's royalties will go to noah 's ark children 's hospital , in cardiff .

documents.title: snoop dogg for reality show
text: snoop dogg is is to star in a new reality series on the bet network on us tv .
fellow rappers birdman and jermaine dupri plus jay-z 's former manager damon dash will star in the programme which is expected to air late next year .
filming of the eight-episode series will begin in los angeles next month .
it will focus on the business side of hip hop .
`` from family to business to their love lives , the series will be packed with drama , laughs and hashtag-worthy one-liners , '' bet said in a statement .
author: NME

documents.title: father ted 's kelly has parkinson 's
text: father ted star frank kelly has revealed he has parkinson 's disease .
kelly , who played the revolting father jack hackett in the series , told the irish sun that he plans to keep working .
`` i 've been working as an actor for over 50 years , and a shaky hand certainly wo n't stop me , '' he said .
`` i remain open to offers for work on stage and screen .
`` you might have heard of the american actor michael j fox , who was diagnosed with parkinson 's 22 years ago and is still working today .
i 'm the same . ''
author: RTE

documents.title: elton enters garden of eden
text: sir elton john 's june performance at cornwall 's eden project is to be broadcast exclusively on the bbc iplayer from 23 october .
elton live at eden includes many of his iconic hits and album tracks such as candle in the wind , i 'm still standing , goodbye yellow brick road and crocodile rock .
sir elton said : `` the eden sessions shows we did in june were so exciting for my band and myself .
the eden project is a very beautiful venue with a joyous atmosphere , and it brought a smile to my face very time i looked out to the audience to see so many people of all ages enjoying my music !
that 's what it 's all about - it 's why i do what i do . ''
aw , we 're welling up elt !

documents.title: ridley to direct la riots film
text: john ridley , the oscar-winning writer of steve mcqueen 's 12 years a slave , is set to direct his los angeles riots script .
ridley is also known for creating the emmy-winning series american crime .
the riots kicked off in april 1992 , after the acquittal of four lapd officers who were tried for the beating of black motorist rodney king .
looting and fires carried on for four days , leaving more than 50 dead and 2,300 injured .
author: Deadline

documents.title: piers to join breakfast show
text: piers morgan had better make sure his alarm clock 's in full working order - the former mirror editor and tv presenter will be joining the good morning britain presenting team next month .
piers will join susanna reid on the sofa three days a week on the itv breakfast programme .
he said : `` i am very excited at the prospect of waking up at 3am every morning , and even more excited by the thought of how annoying susanna is going to find me after a few months .
good morning britain is a great show with a terrific team on and off screen .
i 'm looking forward to it enormously . ''
the 50-year-old , who presents piers morgan 's life stories on itv , presented piers morgan live on cnn in the us between 2011 and 2014 .
love him or loathe him ?
let us know what you think .

documents.title: jackson lands number one album - again
text: janet jackson has landed her seventh us number one with her latest album unbreakable .
she is only the third act to achieve number one albums in each of the last four decades .
unbreakable is jackson 's first studio album since discipline in 2008 , which also debuted at number one .
her other number ones are all for you ( 2001 ) , the velvet rope ( 1997 ) , janet .
( 1993 ) , janet jackson 's rhythm nation 1814 ( 1989 ) and control ( 1986 ) .
only barbra streisand and madonna have had more number one albums as female artists , with 10 and eight respectively .
go janet !
author: Billboard

and morgan has responded in kind .

documents.title: john legend announces wife 's pregnancy
text: all of me singer john legend and chrissy teigen are expecting their first child .
the musician and his wife announced the pregnancy on monday on instagram .
the pair married in 2013 .

documents.title: brummie ballet
text: the sadler 's wells royal ballet company packed up their ballet shoes and tutus and moved to birmingham in 1990 .
now called the birmingham royal ballet , the company are celebrating their 25th anniversary .
to mark this milestone , works by sir peter wright , george balanchine , frederick ashton and alexander whitley are being staged both at the birmingham hippodrome and sadler 's wells .
news went behind the scenes during rehearsals .

documents.title: elvis turns down panto
text: elvis costello speaks to our arts editor , will gompertz , about how he stumbled into music before becoming an `` overnight success '' and how he wants to follow in the footsteps of david essex .
who 'd have thought it ?
and he 's just turned down the role of captain hook in panto - because he wants to spend christmas with his children .
everybody say - aaaah .

documents.title: booker winner to be revealed
text: the winner of the man booker prize is announced later with hanya yanagihara 's a little life the bookies ' favourite to take the £ 50,000 prize .
yanagihara 's novel , the story of four college friends seeking fame and fortune in new york , is tipped to win by bookmakers william hill and coral .
it is the second year the prize is open to all authors writing in english , regardless of nationality .
the winner will be announced at london 's guildhall on tuesday night .
we 'll let you know the winner as soon as have it !

documents.title: breakingdanny cohen to leave bbc
text: danny cohen is leaving the bbc as its director of television .
director general tony hall said the former bbc three controller leaves the corporation `` in rude health and brilliant creative form '' .
`` i wish him well for the future .
he 's a great talent and i 'm sure he 'll take up an exciting new leadership challenge very soon .
he deserves every success . ''

documents.title: tenor bocelli duets with ariana grande
text: italian tenor andrea bocelli looks set to expand his huge fanbase by duetting with pop star ariana grande on his new album , cinema , which features songs from films .
they sing e piu ti penso ( the more i think of you ) from the film once upon a time in america .
bocelli , who has sold 85 million albums , is the classical charts ' best-selling singer of all time .
grande is no stranger to selling millions of albums and topping the charts either .
the tenor said that singing with grande had been a treat , partly because his two sons are such big fans .
`` she comes from a different repertoire and her voice is very nice , very sensual .
i think for her also it 's been very interesting to change the atmosphere of the repertoire , i think that her fans will be very surprised . ''

documents.title: brucie back on dance floor
text: sir bruce forsyth is to be reunited with tess daly for a special strictly come dancing for bbc children in need .
the show will feature an exclusive appearance from us singer and actress selena gomez , performing same old love .
sir bruce hosted strictly for 10 years until 2014 .
jenny agutter , laura main , stephen mcgann and jack ashton from bbc one drama call the midwife will be getting spray tanned and spangly before taking to the dance floor .
children in need takes place on 13 november .
bruce is currently recovering at home following a fall last week so we look forward to seeing him back on the small screen .

documents.title: dicaprio grabs vw film rights
text: actor and environmentalist leonardo dicaprio has jumped on the movie rights for a book proposal about the volkswagen cars scandal .
german carmaker vw was
wolf of wall street star dicaprio was keen to be first in line for the book , which will be written by new york times journalist jack ewing .
the three-time oscar nominee and star of films including inception and the departed has also written , produced and narrated an environmentally-themed documentary , the 11th hour .
the book is expected to investigate how a `` more , better , faster '' ethos was behind one of the greatest frauds in corporate history .
watch this space for casting details .

documents.title: craig 'loves playing bond ' says harris
text: naomie harris has insisted daniel craig was `` just being sarcastic '' during a recently published interview , in which he said he wanted to `` move on '' from the james bond series .
`` daniel lives and breathes bond , '' said the actress , who will shortly be seen reprising her role as moneypenny in new film spectre .
according to harris , though , `` it was not as he intended it , '' she told bbc news , claiming her co-star 's `` sense of humour does n't come across particularly well in print '' .
`` he 's so dedicated to his craft and he loves playing bond , '' she told bbc news at a promotional event for technology that features in sam mendes ' film .
spectre , the 24th instalment in the official bond series , will have its world premiere at london 's royal albert hall on 26 october .
author: Neil Smith, entertainment reporter
Arts reporter

documents.title: whittingdale backs bbc stations
text: the culture secretary has played down fears over the future of bbc music stations , calling them `` absolutely essential '' to uk music .
john whittingdale , who is overseeing the bbc 's royal charter renewal , said he wanted it to keep providing services `` like radio 1 , radio 2 and radio 3 '' .
`` i want the bbc to go on providing services like radio 1 , radio 2 , radio 3 - all of which cater for tastes which are not served by the commercial sector .
`` in some ways , actually , my criticism of the bbc is that they do n't do enough for music .
radio is very well served but [ on ] tv , i 'd actually like to see a bit more .
`` as long as i am secretary of state , i will continue to support the bbc in highlighting the incredible talent that we have in this country . ''
author: Mark Savage
Music reporter

documents.title: get involved
text: as always we 'd love to hear your thoughts on any of our stories today so please get in touch
author: Emma Saunders
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: good morning
text: get ready for today 's live page , packed with all the latest news from the world of entertainment and arts .
we 'll keep you across what 's happening , including what naomie harris said in response to daniel craig 's less than complimentary comments about playing james bond again .
author: Helen Bushby
Entertainment and arts reporter
